bullets.text: I'm a data professional with a passion for uncovering insights hidden in numbers.
With experience in both data analysis and data science, I specialize in transforming raw, complex data into meaningful stories and actionable strategies.
From cleaning messy datasets to building predictive models, I enjoy the entire journey of data ‚Äî from exploration to decision-making.
Whether it's optimizing business processes, solving real-world problems, or discovering patterns others miss, I aim to turn data into a powerful asset.
My toolkit includes Python, SQL, and machine learning, along with data visualization tools like Tableau and Power BI.
But more than tools, I bring curiosity, critical thinking, and a drive to make data work for people ‚Äî not just dashboards.

project.name: Predicting Player Online Gaming Behavior
project.tools: Python (Pandas, scikit-learn), SHAP, Google Colab,  Matplotlib, Seaborn.
project.info: Developed and evaluated classification models to predict user engagement in gaming, uncovering key behavioral drivers through model interpretation and informing data-driven retention strategies.

project.name: Bar Crawl Detecting Heavy Drinking
project.tools: Python (Pandas, NumPy), SciPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Google Colab, Tableau.
project.info: Applied time series analysis and classification techniques to detect behavioral patterns associated with heavy drinking, leveraging entropy-based features for predictive modeling and early intervention insights.

project.name: NYC TLC Trip Record Analysis Insights into Urban Mobility Patterns
project.tools: R (dplyr, ggplot2, lubridate, sf, leaflet), RStudio, SQL, PowerBI

project.name: Urban spatial order: street network orientation, configuration, and entropy
project.tools: Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, SciPy), Google Colab
project.info: Applied clustering techniques to analyze street network patterns across 100 global cities, uncovering spatial similarities based on features like circuity, orientation entropy, and connectivity to support urban planning insights.
